title: The Day Boy and the Night Girl
description: The Day Boy and the Night Girl is a classic fairy tale written by George MacDonald. The story follows a young prince named Photogen who is cursed to be blind during the day and can only see at night. One night, he encounters a mysterious girl named Nycteris who can only see during the day. As they spend time together, they begin to understand each other's worlds and learn to appreciate the beauty of both day and night. However, their happiness is threatened by the evil wizard, Watho, who seeks to keep them apart. With the help of a wise old man, the Day Boy and the Night Girl must overcome Watho's magic and find a way to be together.
